item.name: HTTP_NOT_FOUND
item.message: Page not found

item.name: ERRORCODE_TIME_RESTRICTION_START
item.message: PP - time_restriction_start error: @date (@timestamp)

item.name: ERRORCODE_TIME_RESTRICTION_END
item.message: PP - time_restriction_end error: @date (@timestamp)

item.name: ERRORCODE_FILE_NOT_FOUND
item.message: PP - @filename doesn't exist!

item.name: ERRORCODE_DIR_NOT_FOUND
item.message: PP - ticket store location doesn't exist! (@location)

item.name: ERRORCODE_DIR_NOT_WRITABLE
item.message: PP - unable to create ticket in @location

item.name: ERRORCODE_STREAMING_PROFILE_NOT_FOUND
item.message: PP - There was no streaming server profile found for the video container used in this mediafile. (video container: '@video_container')

item.name: ERRORCODE_NO_MEDIAFILE_FOUND_FOR_PROFILE_ID
item.message: PP - For the given asset and profile_id no mediafile was found.

item.name: ERRORCODE_QUERY_ERROR
item.message: Incorrect database query

item.name: STREAM_DOWNLOAD_NOT_ALLOWED
item.message: Download not allowed for external streams

item.name: ERRORCODE_NO_METAFILE_AVAILABLE
item.message: This container type doesn't support metafiles (@container_type)

item.name: ERRORCODE_JOBS_COULD_NOT_BE_STOPPED
item.message: Some jobs could not be stopped. Please delete the jobs, or try again later.

item.name: ERRORCODE_REST_CALL_IS_DISABLED
item.message: Rest call to '@uri' has been disabled, please check documentation.

item.name: ERRORCODE_UNABLE_TO_CREATE_SYMLINK
item.message: Unable to create symbolic link ticket to file.

item.name: ERRORCODE_ASSET_NOT_FOUND
item.message: MM - asset_id=@asset_id was not found in the database

item.name: ERRORCODE_MEDIAFILE_NOT_FOUND
item.message: MM - mediafile_id=@mediafile_id was not found in the database

item.name: ERRORCODE_INVALID_APP_ID
item.message: MM - invalid application id (app_id)

item.name: ERRORCODE_INVALID_USER_ID
item.message: MM - the specified user_id (@user_id) is not the owner of this asset

item.name: ERRORCODE_UNKNOWN_ERROR_SAVING_METADATA
item.message: MM - unknows error while saving metadata for asset_id @asset_id

item.name: ERRORCODE_EMPTY_RESULT
item.message: MM - The query returned an empty result set (i.e. zero rows).

item.name: ERRORCODE_COLLECTION_NOT_FOUND
item.message: MM - coll_id=@coll_id was not found in the database

item.name: ERRORCODE_COLLECTION_ASSET_RELATION_ALREADY_EXISTS
item.message: MM - the asset is already present in the collection

item.name: ERRORCODE_COLLECTION_ASSET_RELATION_NOT_FOUND
item.message: MM - the asset/collection relation was not found in the database

item.name: ERRORCODE_ASSET_NOT_EMPTY
item.message: MM - there are still @mediafile_count mediafile(s) present in this asset.

item.name: ERRORCODE_COLLECTION_NOT_EMPTY
item.message: MM - there are still @asset_count asset(s) present in this collection.

item.name: ERRORCODE_ASSET_SUPPLEMENT_NOT_FOUND
item.message: MM - Supplement @supplement_id not found.

item.name: ERRORCODE_WEBSERVICE_DISABLED
item.message: The webservices has been disabled

item.name: ERRORCODE_INVALID_ASSET_MEDIAFILE_COMBINATION
item.message: MM - invalid asset/mediafile combination

item.name: ERRORCODE_NO_CHANGES
item.message: Insufficient paramaters given, changes not saved

item.name: ERRORCODE_INVALID_FAV_TYPE
item.message: Invalid favorite type (@type), valid favorite types; (@valid_types)

item.name: ERRORCODE_INVALID_TIMESTAMP
item.message: @name is not a valid datetime or timestamp value, must be in format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:DD / YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM / YYYY-MM-DD HH / YYYY-MM-DD / YYYY-MM / YYYY

item.name: ERRORCODE_UNEXPECTED_ERROR
item.message: A unexpected program error / problem happened

item.name: ERRORCODE_MISSING_TIMESTAMP
item.message: @name must have 2 dates separated with a |

item.name: ERRORCODE_CANT_PLAY_MEDIAFILE
item.message: This mediafile (@mediafile_id) can not be played; @reason.

item.name: ERRORCODE_CANT_TRANSCODE_MEDIAFILE
item.message: This mediafile (@mediafile_id) can not be transcoded; @reason.

item.name: ERRORCODE_APP_DISABLED
item.message: This application has been disabled

item.name: ERRORCODE_UNKNOWN_JOB
item.message: Jobs - unknown job specified

item.name: ERRORCODE_VALIDATE_INVALID_TYPE
item.message: VPX - invalid type specified: @type

item.name: ERRORCODE_VALIDATE_INVALID_LENGTH_USE
item.message: VPX - 'length' can not be used in combination with 'length_{min|max}'

item.name: ERRORCODE_VALIDATE_REQUIRED_PARAMETER
item.message: VPX - missing required parameter: @param (@type)

item.name: ERRORCODE_VALIDATE_FAILED
item.message: VPX - parameter validation failed: @param (@type)

item.name: ERRORCODE_SORT_FIELD_ERROR
item.message: VPX - sorting on '@field' is not allowed

item.name: ERRORCODE_SORT_DIRECTION_ERROR
item.message: VPX - invalid sort direction specified: '@sort_direction'. Use 'ASC' or 'DESC' instead.

item.name: ERRORCODE_PP_INVALID_TIME
item.message: PP - parameter validation failed: @param (@type) should be less than 87 400 000 msec (=24h)

item.name: ERRORCODE_VALIDATE_INVALID_LANGUAGE
item.message: VPX - 'language' parameter validation failed. Please use the 2-letter codes as defined in ISO 639-1.

item.name: ERRORCODE_INVALID_SUPPLEMENT
item.message: Invalid XML or maximum allowed size exceeded

item.name: ERRORCODE_MIX_OF_URI_AND_FILE
item.message: A single mediafile can't have a URI and a filename!

item.name: ERRORCODE_CHANGE_URI_AND_FILE
item.message: A URI-based mediafile can't be changed to a file-based mediafile and visa vers.

item.name: ERRORCODE_CHANGE_OWNERSHIP_MISSING_PARAMETERS
item.message: No 'old' or 'new' value present

item.name: ERRORCODE_INSUFFICIENT_PARAMETERS
item.message: Insufficient parameters given

item.name: ERRORCODE_SUPPLEMENT_LIMIT_REACHED
item.message: Maximum number of supplements for this assed reached (@max)

item.name: ERRORCODE_MEDIAFILE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED
item.message: Download is disabled for this mediafile

item.name: ERRORCODE_QUOTA_REACHED
item.message: Quota limit reached. Allowed size: @quota MB. Used size: @used MB.

item.name: ERRORCODE_HOSTNAME_ALREADY_IN_GROUP
item.message: The hostname (@hostname) is already a member of the autorisation group (@group).

item.message: The hostname (@hostname) was not found in the autorisation group (@group).

item.message: There are still one or more hostnames present in this autorisation group (@group)

item.message: Search parameters syntax contains a syntax error, please check your search_* parameters

item.message: Search parameters syntax ends abruptly

item.name: ERRORCODE_VALIDATE_SEARCH_SYNTAX_FAILED_INVALID_FIELD
item.message: Search parameters: you can't search on field '@field'

item.name: ERRORCODE_METADATA_DEFINITION_NOT_EMPTY
item.message: There are still one or more properties present in this property definition

item.message: Invalid metadata definition

item.message: The hostname (@hostname) with type (@hostname_type) must be the same type as the group (@group) with type (@group_type).

item.message: You can't change the type of group '@group', when it contains hostnames.
